preconditions.precondition: Designer requests design requirements from Project Team.

mainSequence.step: Project Team queries User Research about user needs and preferences.
Project Team requests brand guidelines from Design Guidelines.
Designer analyzes user insights and brand guidelines.
Designer submits wireframe for feedback from Project Team.
Project Team provides feedback to Designer.
Designer revises wireframe based on feedback.
Designer resubmits revised wireframe to Project Team.
Designer starts design implementation based on approved wireframe with CMS.
